transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yes sir, good afternoon. Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Badhiya, aap bataye.
Executive: Main bhi theek hu sir. Thank you so much for asking. Baki business vagerah kaise chal raha hai sir IndiaMART ke sath?
Customer: Ek cheez puchne ke liye maine call kiya tha. Actually mujhe ek mail aaya mam.
Executive: Haan ji, kaunsa mail aaya aapko?
Customer: Haan, IndiaMART ke taraf se Kumari Pinky ke naam naam se mail aaya hai aur yeh mail mein mujhe bola gaya hai business certificate, GST certificate, address proof, ID proof, banking proof yeh sab kyun manga ja raha hai?
Executive: Kyunki I think pehle aapka buyer aur supplier ka conflict ho chuka hai. Kyunki pehle aapke against mein complaint ki hai, theek hai? Customer ka naam hai sir Shubham, theek hai? Customer ka naam hai Shubham naam ka ek customer hai. Usne payment kiya tha 10 July 2025 ko PhonePe ke through, theek hai? Ah, main aapko pura mail padh ke sunati hu. Aap ek baar dhyan dena.
Customer: Haan, bataiye na.
Executive: Theek hai? As per the customer name Shubham, he has payment of usne aapko sir 10 July 2025 ko PhonePe ke through payment kiya tha. Kuch PhonePe ke through kiya tha, kuch cash ke through kiya tha, theek hai? Woh payment karne ke baad aapne us client ko bola tha ki jo aapka uska product hai woh 5 se 6 din mein deliver ho jayega. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Lekin aapne uske product ki quality issue kuch theek hai? Baki aapne bola tha ki battery short nahi kar rahi hai properly. Yeh customer mam kaha ke hai?
Customer: Sir yaha pe jo mentioned hai woh main dekh ke bata rahi hu. Shubham Shubham Kumar Gopalpur, Gopalpur ke hai I think sir. Shubham Kumar Gopalpur karke inka ek mail id hai @gmail.com karke.
Customer: Hmm. Haan actually kya hai ki yeh customer ka complaint mera office se hi mere liye aaya hua hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ki inka battery haan, inka battery gaya tha, theek hai. Inhone short circuit kiya, theek. Uske baad inhone complaint kiya customer ne ki mera battery nahi chal raha hai, theek. Haan haan, unhone wahi bola. Inke battery ko haan, inke battery ko mangaya gaya. Battery ko wapas se sahi karke phir bheja gaya. And pata nahi yeh banda shayad research and development R&D kar raha hai ya khud se kuch karna chah raha hai. Wapas se short circuit hua, theek hai. Phir se battery mein issue aa gaya. Usne phir se bheja, theek. Tab har baar kya hai kya ki free of cost isko banaya nahi ja sakta tha kyunki is baar BMS kharab ho gaya, theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Phir se BMS kharab ho gaya toh BMS haan. Toh warranty mein aur yeh bola gaya tha ki warranty mein main pehle bhi likhta hu ki short circuit warranty ke andar nahi aayega, theek hai. Agar battery mein issue aata hai toh main dekh lunga.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: But first time first time short circuit ko bhi maine entertain karwaya tha kyunki customer ne directly mujhe call kar diya tha, theek hai ki haan sir mera complaint ko dekh lo. Haan. And after that ab jab yeh hua toh office se mujhe yeh kaha gaya ki sir main baar baar isko replace nahi kar sakta hai BMS ko. Customer se jab payment ke liye bola ja raha hai toh customer uselessly dhamki de rahe hai ki main police mein jaunga, consumer forum mein jaunga aisa kuch.
Customer: Toh maine yeh kaha ki theek hai agar unka short circuit hai toh aap ek report banakar customer ko aap likh kar bhej do ki aapka short circuit hua hai, BMS ka payment lagega. Theek hai. And uske baad phir customer ne ab pata nahi kya kiya hai ki har jagah woh negative review unhone likha. Ab main kya karunga? Toh is case mein maine apna haath kheech liya ki ab nahi kar sakta kyunki abhi iska agar har kisi ko entertain karunga main toh business mein mujhe loss lagega.
Executive: Sir woh baat main samajh rahi hu lekin usse kuch din pehle again aapka ek kisi buyer ke against mein complaint kiya tha. Ujjwal Manna naam ka buyer tha sir usse usne bhi aapke against mein Ujjwal Manna unka unka toh haan unka toh problem solve ho gaya.
Customer: Haan sir unka resolve ho gaya hai woh theek hai mujhe pata hai. But jo hamari company hai woh yeh cheez dekhti hai ki ek saal ke andar aapke kitne complaints aaye hai. Samajh rahe ho aap? Toh woh kahin na kahin aapka complaint bhi dekhti hai ki ek saal ke andar Ujjwal Manna ka bhi complaint aaya tha. Phir Shubham ka yeh toh problem hai toh yeh kab se chal raha hai? Unka buyer ka I think.
Customer: Inka inka main inka toh main kuch bhi nahi kar sakta hu kyunki yeh yeh customer bahut hi jyada matlab ab rude behavior mujhse bhi galat galat language mein baat kar liya. Ab yeh ab yeh mam personally mere ego pe aa gaya hai. Agar is case mein aayega toh IndiaMART band kar dunga alag baat hai but is customer ko entertain bilkul nahi karunga. Strictly main bol raha hu.
Executive: Bas yeh chalega. Ujjwal Manna ka Ujjwal Manna ka issue yeh ho gaya tha na mam ki unka battery mein battery balance hona tha. Actually aap shayad yeh cheez ko nahi samjhenge theek hai kyunki is line mein aap nahi hai. Battery aaya tha aur Diwali set ka vacation ho gaya tha iske karan unka battery thoda sa lamba time tak around lagabhag 10-12 din extra rakha reh gaya, hai na? Toh woh personally maine haan. Sir usse pehle bhi jo aapki complaint aaye hai woh Maurya naam ke ek buyer the, theek hai? Woh Ghazipur ke the. Unhone bhi aapke against Maurya Maurya naam ka ek buyer tha Ghazipur ka tha sir. Unhone bhi aapke against mein complaint kiye the woh 2 July 2025 ko kiye the sir.
Customer: Samajh rahi hu.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: And iske alawa aur?
Executive: Ah iske alawa mujhe check karna padega ek minute. Yeh toh mujhe do se teen abhi ke time mein toh yahi dikh raha hai. Iske alawa sir mere paas koi complaint nahi hai matlab within one year actually aapke itne tickets khali hai sir. Maurya ka complaint toh mujhe khair pata nahi hai mere tak aaya nahi. Mere tak yeh do complaint aaya hai, theek hai aur jis complaint ko maine resolve ek ek toh main Shubham naam ke customer jo hai inka maine apne end se replace battery replace naya battery maine bhijwa diya ki chalo theek hai jaane do kyunki yeh bol rahe the ki nahi sir main student hu main kaha se paise launga whatever jo bhi hai. Toh maine bola ek kaam karo bhai aap inko naya battery aap inko bhej do. New battery bhijwa diya phir se bande ne short circuit kar diya ab kya hai ki baar baar is cheez ka main agar apne end se main office mein bolna shuru kar du ki theek hai aap wapas naya bhej do phir toh office wale bhi advantage lene lag jayenge.
Executive: Haan haan. Sir dekho agar koi buyer hamare paas complaint karta hai toh hamare paas ek concern open ho jata hai, theek hai? Toh is buyer ne aapke behalf se complaint kiya tha toh hamare paas concern open kiya tha. Baki aap mujhe ek cheez batao hamari ek category hai electric bicycle electric cycle ki is category mein aap dealing nahi kar rahe hai kya? Aur EV EV motor and kit ki category mein hum nahi dealing kar rahe?
Customer: Abhi deal sirf battery mein kar rahe hai hum log.
Executive: Sir battery mein dealing kar rahe hai. Theek hai sir isi ke regarding maine aapko call kiya tha baki aapne customer care pe call kiya hai, theek hai? Toh main apne side se yeh concern close kar rahi hu kyunki sir legal ki jo legal team hoti hai woh aapko connect karegi iske regarding. Isme mera koi involvement nahi hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh mere liye aapke paas ek feedback jayega sir woh mere behalf pe hoga ki aapne maine aapko is cheez explain kiya ya nahi kiya, discussion kiya ya nahi kiya.
Customer: Nahi nahi yeh legal team wali kaunsi baat hai ek baar mujhe yeh cheez toh clear karao. Sir dekho legal team jo hai legal team mein yeh jo aapki Pinky hai na Kumari Pinky yeh aapko connect karegi sir.
Customer: Haan. Aap toh unko boliye connect karne ke liye mail karne se nahi hoga na.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Sir dekho woh jo documents mang rahi hai woh documents toh aapko share karna padega na matlab ki jo kuch bhi documents aapki mang rahi hai woh.
Customer: Achha. Haan ji. Yeh saare documents toh mere maine pehle bhi share kiya hua hai IndiaMART ko main alag se phir kya hi share kar dunga. Aapne IndiaMART ko share kiya hai but IndiaMART ke paas nahi rehta hai matlab ki jo bhi log rehte hai na woh har ek cheez ke alag alag team hoti hai. Main yaha pe aapke liye service team pe baithi hui hu, theek hai? Toh unka kaam hai agar aapko phir main yeh soch raha hu toh phir inka requirement kis cheez ke liye requirement hai yeh jo unhone manga GST certificate ya phir whatever jo bhi hai. Yeh kis kis cheez ke liye manga gaya hai agar agar woh IndiaMART se related nahi hai. ke verification ke regarding unhone manga hoga sir.
Customer: Yeh toh thoda samajh se pare hai IndiaMART jab verify kar chuka hai aur ek baar nahi teen baar verify kar chuka hai. And after that hum alag se. Haan. Boliye. Boliye. Mujhe boliye. Boliye boliye haan aap boliye. Mujhe dekho IndiaMART nahi main yeh bol raha hu IndiaMART already teen baar verify kar chuka hai jab maine first time liya tha six months ke liye. documents bas inko chahiye toh bas aapke documents chahiye sir. Haan theek hai main bhej dunga koi issue nahi hai mujhe bhejne mein koi aapatti nahi hai. Theek hai chaliye aur koi baat? Nahi sir toh main aapko yeh concern close kar du jo aapne customer care pe call kiya hai?
Customer: Kar dijiye kyunki aap aapka number mere paas save nahi tha isliye maine customer care pe call kiya.
Executive: Achha toh matlab aap aapko WhatsApp pe apna number de rahi hu, theek hai? Mere liye feedback jayega sir please aap satisfied mark kar dena, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay. Thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asked about documents requested by IndiaMART.

- Customer mentioned negative reviews by a customer.

- Customer expressed frustration with repeat issues.



Resolution:

- Executive explained reason for document request.

- Executive mentioned legal team will connect with customer.

- Executive offered to close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Legal team will connect with the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- documents, verification, complaints, legal team
